title: A Connecticut Family's Nightmare
description: Dark Siege is the fictional tale of the haunting of an upper middle-class family in rural Connecticut based on non-fictional activity that occurs in America's homes. At the end of the book, in a chapter by chapter analysis, the author explains the science, religion and spirituality behind all of the phenomena that is occurring, as well as an interesting look into his thrilling career as a paranormal investigator and journalist.
author: Jason McLeod
